Text:
this is an audio-book..
but if you are ready for a boring man talking for 45 min.. then you should download it;)
 thankz anyway
Thanx, can use this on the Ipod for those long trips.

The Teaching Company is more or less anti-marxist etc while pretending to be totally "objective" (listened to lots of their audio-files about famous economists and their portrait of marx, in contrast with the other "classical" economists is telling).  There is another one about the Russian Revolution in color, which will most probably bring other perspectives http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3886178/The_Russian_Revolution_in_Colour_-_Part_1_and_2
Thx man. Never mind the bollocks. ;)

Brabancon,

After all who could be "anti-Marxist" - all they did was murder 100 million people in the 20th century.
